repos_data.description: Test your prompts, models, RAGs. Evaluate and compare LLM outputs, catch regressions, and improve prompt quality. LLM evals for OpenAI/Azure GPT, Anthropic Claude, VertexAI Gemini, Ollama, Local & private models like Mistral/Mixtral/Llama with CI/CD
